mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRJ_LOG (LOG_ID , CRT_DT , CRTR , PRJ_ID , STTS) VALUES ('PL-' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') || '-' || LPAD(SEQ_PRJ_LOG_PK.NEXTVAL,5,'0') , SYSDATE , #{crtr} , #{prjId} , #{stts})
mapper.select: SELECT PL.LOG_ID PK_COL , PL.LOG_ID , DENSE_RANK() OVER(ORDER BY PL.CRT_DT || PL.LOG_ID DESC) RNUM , TO_CHAR(PL.CRT_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') CRT_DT , PL.CRTR , PL.PRJ_ID , CD.CD_NM STTS FROM PRJ_LOG PL JOIN CMN_CD CD ON PL.STTS = CD.CD_ID
